name: Tadasana (Mountain Pose)
benefits: Improves posture, strengthens thighs, knees, and ankles, and enhances focus.

name: Vrikshasana (Tree Pose)
benefits: Improves balance, strengthens legs, and enhances concentration.

name: Bhujangasana (Cobra Pose)
benefits: Strengthens the spine, relieves back pain, and stretches chest and shoulders.

name: Adho Mukha Svanasana (Downward Dog Pose)
benefits: Strengthens arms, legs, and core, improves blood circulation, and stretches muscles.

name: Paschimottanasana (Seated Forward Bend)
benefits: Stretches spine, hamstrings, and lower back, improves digestion, and reduces stress.

name: Dhanurasana (Bow Pose)
benefits: Strengthens back and core, improves posture, and relieves stress.

name: Utkatasana (Chair Pose)
benefits: Strengthens thighs, ankles, and spine, and enhances endurance.

name: Padmasana (Lotus Pose)
benefits: Calms the mind, improves posture, and enhances meditation practice.

name: Trikonasana (Triangle Pose)
benefits: Improves flexibility, strengthens legs, and stretches the spine.

name: Setu Bandhasana (Bridge Pose)
benefits: Strengthens back, relieves lower back pain, and improves digestion.

name: Navasana (Boat Pose)
benefits: Strengthens core, improves balance, and stimulates digestion.

name: Savasana (Corpse Pose)
benefits: Relaxes the body, reduces stress, and improves mental clarity.
